    • About This Site

    Thank you for taking the time to look at my website - I truly appreciate it. Alot of time went into the designing, coding, and content creating for it, with me going through multiple iterations of it all.

    While no project is ever perfect, I believe in continuous improvement. If you notice anything or have any suggestions feel free to reach out to me and let me know!

    Tools Used

    This website was centered around HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with Nunjucks for templating and Eleventy (11ty) as the static site generator.

    Deployment and automation are handled through GitHub Actions. You can explore the documentation for each technology clicking the icons below, or view the full source code via the GitHub link.

    Acknowledgements

    As always, this site was not created in a vaccuum and I would like to give credit where it is due.

    The background map was created using mapstyler.dev4pgh.com created by the Dev4PGH team.

    Design inspiration came from a variety of places with the main sources of inspiration being from:
    - victoriapuckkaram.com
    - jareddillard.com

    I also relied numerous community resources and tutorials to develop components on this site. While there are too many to list individually, I would like to thank them regardless.
